ProjectInfo.Civilopedia: Use this to weaken enemy cities.

ProjectInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Newly created living units might start with Strong and Mutated promotions.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]More Chaos Mana will increase the chance.

ProjectInfo.Civilopedia: Fair? Which winds are fair and which ones are not? That really depends on how I blow them, doesn't it?
ProjectInfo.Strategy: Use Billowing Gale enchantment to slow down your enemy units.
